statements: SELECT * FROM course_completion
SELECT course_id, student_id FROM course_completion WHERE completion_status = 'Completed'
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM course_completion
SELECT * FROM course_completion ORDER BY completion_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_completion
SELECT * FROM course_completion WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY completion_date DESC, course_id ASC
SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM course_completion GROUP BY course_id HAVING completion_status = 'Completed'
SELECT course_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), completion_date)) AS avg_days_to_complete FROM course_completion GROUP BY course_id
SELECT student_id, MAX(completion_date) AS last_completion_date FROM course_completion WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' GROUP BY student_id
SELECT * FROM course_completion WHERE completion_status IN ('Completed', 'In Progress') ORDER BY course_id, student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM CourseCompletionRates;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_id, completion_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT student_id, engagement_rate FROM StudentEngagement WHERE course_id IN (101, 102);
SELECT student_id, engagement_rate FROM StudentEngagement WHERE engagement_rate > 0.8 AND course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM CourseCompletionRates JOIN StudentEngagement ON CourseCompletionRates.course_id = StudentEngagement.course_id WHERE completion_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY completion_rate DESC
SELECT course_id, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement FROM StudentEngagement GROUP BY course_id HAVING avg_engagement > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_engagement DESC
SELECT course_id, engagement_rate FROM StudentEngagement WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND engagement_rate < 0.6 ORDER BY engagement_rate ASC

SELECT StudentEngagement.student_id, CourseCompletionRates.completion_rate FROM StudentEngagement INNER JOIN CourseCompletionRates ON StudentEngagement.course_id = CourseCompletionRates.course_id WHERE completion_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY student_id ASC

SELECT MAX(completion_rate) AS max_completion_rate, MIN(engagement_rate) AS min_engagement_rate FROM CourseCompletionRates JOIN StudentEngagement ON CourseCompletionRates.course_id = StudentEngagement.course_id WHERE completion_rate > 0.5 AND engagement_rate < 0.7
SELECT * FROM course_completion WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM course_details;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_details WHERE enrolled_courses > 2;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name FROM student_details JOIN course_details ON student_details.enrolled_courses = course_details.course_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_status FROM course_completion WHERE student_id = 101;

SELECT * FROM course_completion JOIN student_details ON course_completion.student_id = student_details.student_id JOIN course_details ON course_completion.course_id = course_details.course_id WHERE completion_status = TRUE;

SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_details INNER JOIN course_completion ON student_details.student_id = course_completion.student_id INNER JOIN course_details ON course_completion.course_id = course_details.course_id WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics';

SELECT student_name, enrolled_courses, instructor_name FROM student_details JOIN course_completion ON student_details.student_id = course_completion.student_id JOIN course_details ON course_completion.course_id = course_details.course_id WHERE enrolled_courses > 2;
SELECT course_name, completion_status FROM course_details JOIN course_completion ON course_details.course_id = course_completion.course_id WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, instructor_name FROM student_details JOIN course_completion ON student_details.student_id = course_completion.student_id JOIN course_details ON course_completion.course_id = course_details.course_id WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course WHERE completion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Student ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM Course ORDER BY completion_rate ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Student JOIN Enrollment ON Student.student_id = Enrollment.student_id JOIN Course ON Enrollment.course_id = Course.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, completion_rate FROM Course WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Student ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Student JOIN Enrollment ON Student.student_id = Enrollment.student_id JOIN Course ON Course.course_id = Enrollment.course_id;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) as total_students FROM Course JOIN Enrollment ON Course.course_id = Enrollment.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT * FROM course
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM course
SELECT student_name, email FROM student
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_date FROM completion
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, email FROM student WHERE graduation_date IS NULL;
SELECT student_name, course_name, engagement_date, interaction_type FROM student, course, engagement WHERE student.student_id = engagement.student_id AND course.course_id = engagement.course_id;
SELECT * FROM enrollment JOIN course ON enrollment.course_id = course.course_id JOIN student ON enrollment.student_id = student.student_id WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT student_name, course_name, completion_date FROM student JOIN completion ON student.student_id = completion.student_id JOIN course ON completion.course_id = course.course_id WHERE completion_date < '2022-01-01';
